task: Search for a popular cookie recipe on Allrecipes with more than 1000 reviews and a rating of 4.5 stars or better. Provide the list of ingredients needed.
observation:
The search result for "Best Big, Fat, Chewy Chocolate Chip Cookie" on Allrecipes meets the criteria with 12,573 ratings and a high star rating. The list of ingredients for this recipe is as follows:

- 2 cups all-purpose flour
- 1/2 teaspoon baking soda
- 1/2 teaspoon salt
- 1 cup packed brown sugar
- 3/4 cup unsalted butter, melted
- 1/2 cup white sugar
- 1 large egg
- 1 egg yolk
- 1 tablespoon vanilla extract
- 2 cups semisweet chocolate chips
